welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Turffontein! Known for its rich culture and vibrant energy, this city is sure to charm you. We invite you to explore and experience all that Turffontein has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grand Central Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Oliver Reginald Tambo International (Jan Smuts International)

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The international terminal for all international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pilanesberg Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lanseria Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at Lanseria Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
